message.name: ERR_NO_RULES_AVAILABLE_AT_CALCULATION_DATE
message.locale: No rules were present for this product for the calculation date %1d.

message.name: ERR_RULESET_RNFE
message.locale: No RuleSet could be found for Product "%1s".

message.name: ERR_RULES_UNK_PRERELEASE_FAILED
message.locale: Pre-release Eligibility failed with an internal error on case %1s. Please contact an administrator.

message.name: INF_ELIGIBILITY_FAILED
message.locale: Eligibility failed on Case %1s of type %2s for %3s.

message.name: INF_ELIGIBILITY_FAILED_DETAILS
message.locale: Pre-release Eligibility failed on Case %1s of type %2s for %3s.

message.name: ERR_ELIGIBILITY_NO_RULES_FOR_CERTIFICATION_PERIOD
message.locale: The certification period is not covered by the rules defined for the product.
